SELECT ed.ed_code, ed.user_id, ed.e_code, ed.cardio_weight, ed.strenth_weight, ed.duration, ed.set_count, ed.reps_per_set, TO_CHAR(ed.reg_dt, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as reg_dt, e.exercise_name, e.exercise_type, e.region, e.weight, e.cal_burn
FROM exercise_diary ed JOIN exercise E ON ed.e_code = e.e_code JOIN membership m ON ed.user_id = m.user_id WHERE ed.user_id = #{userId} AND TRUNC(ed.reg_dt) = TO_DATE(#{regDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY e.exercise_type DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exercise_diary ( ed_code, user_id, e_code, cardio_weight, strenth_weight, duration, set_count, reps_per_set, reg_dt ) VALUES ( ED_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardioWeight, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{strenthWeight, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{duration, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{setCount, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{repsPerSet, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO exercise_diary SELECT ED_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS ed_code, 'yangsh' AS userId, '1001' AS eCode, 54 AS cardioWeight, 32 AS strenthWeight, 2 AS duration, 4 AS setCount, 10 AS repsPerSet, TO_DATE(DECODE(MOD(LEVEL, 2), 0, '2025-05-26', '2025-06-22'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS regDt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 502
mapper.update: UPDATE exercise_diary SET cardio_weight = #{cardioWeight, jdbcType=INTEGER}, strenth_weight = #{strenthWeight, jdbcType=INTEGER}, duration = #{duration}, set_count = #{setCount, jdbcType=INTEGER}, reps_per_set = #{repsPerSet, jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE ed_code = #{edCode}
